title: Projected increase of the national defense budget in Canada fiscal years 2018 to 2027
yAxis: Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars
summary: This statistic shows the total amount of u.s. municipal solid waste generated per person per day between 1960 and 2010 . In the united , an average of 4.51 pounds of municipal solid waste were generated daily per person in 2017 . municipal solid waste generation in the United StatesNon-hazardous waste consists of industrial waste and municipal solid waste .
gold: This statistic shows the projected increase over baseline spending for the national defense budget of Canada between the fiscal years 2018 to 2027 . In fiscal year 2027 , the defense budget for Canada is projected to be 2.3 billion Canadian dollars greater than 2026 budget .
